definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: gong1 yong4 jiao1 huan4 dian4 hua4 wang3

sentences.english: Parts for public use and functional segments are the pleas of industri…
sentences.chinese: 公用性和功能性內容是外觀設計專利侵權的抗辯事由。

sentences.english: Street-lamp lighting system is an essential part of public facility for city construction.
sentences.chinese: 路燈照明系統是城市建設不可缺少的公用設施。

sentences.english: Municipality public utility enterprises are responsible for proposing the enterprises' projects of utilizing foreign capital.
sentences.chinese: 城市市政公用企業負責提出本企業的利用外資項目。

sentences.english: He will be concerned also with the zoning and layouts of factories and municipal housing .
sentences.chinese: 他將經營工廠和公用住宅羣的分區規劃和佈局。

sentences.english: The pay phone is in front of the bank.
sentences.chinese: 投幣式公用電話在銀行前面。

sentences.english: In fused-ring and bridge-ring compounds two carbons are common to the two rings .
sentences.chinese: 在稠環和橋環化合物中，兩個碳原子是兩個環公用的。

sentences.english: "Hot desking prevents you developing an individuality within the office," she says.
sentences.chinese: “公用辦公桌阻止你的辦公室裏發展個性，”她說。

sentences.english: Sometimes because of some nearby utility lines, they have to build rails bending.
sentences.chinese: 有時候因爲附近有些公用線路，他們建立了彎曲鐵軌。

sentences.english: The development will consist of 66 dwellings and a number of offices.
sentences.chinese: 新建樓區將由66棟住房和一些辦公用房組成。

sentences.english: This can be done using the "add or remove programs" utility in Windows.
sentences.chinese: 這可以使用“添加或刪除程序”公用事業窗口。

sentences.english: I have all the office supplies I need (p. 92).
sentences.chinese: 我有所有需要的辦公用品。

sentences.english: As production increased, the utility cost could go up too.
sentences.chinese: 隨着生產的增加，其公用事業費也將上升。

sentences.english: Lin's office supplies. How may I direct your call?
sentences.chinese: 林氏辦公用品店。我可以把你的電話接到什麼地方呢？

sentences.english: Both public and private EMON counters may be used for software and hardware tuning.
sentences.chinese: 公用和私用EMON計數器都可用於軟件和硬件調諧。

sentences.english: A public way or thoroughfare in a city or town, usually with a sidewalk or sidewalks.
sentences.chinese: 市或城鎮中的公用路或大道，通常有一或多條人行道。

definition: to leave sth unused/to lie idle
